News.Title: Vardhman Acrylics Q3 Net Profit Surges 85% YoY
News.Summary: Vardhman Acrylics reported strong Q3 performance with net profit jumping 85% to ₹74 million despite revenue declining 6.7% to ₹763 million year-on-year.

News.Title: Vardhman Acrylics Reports Q2 Revenue Decline
News.Summary: Vardhman Acrylics has reported a revenue of 706 million rupees for the second quarter, down from 864 million rupees in the same period last year, representing a year-over-year decrease.

News.Title: Vardhman Acrylics Reports Significant Drop in Q2 Net Profit
News.Summary: Vardhman Acrylics Limited has reported a net profit of 16 million rupees for the second quarter, down from 62 million rupees in the same period last year. This represents a substantial year-over-year decrease in profitability for the company.
